ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] Dark Elf restrictions
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh . . . That would be Freeport, in that case.  Most cities have stone walls, really.  Yes, they ll kill you there, too, but you ll be OK if you kill enough
ygData.messageBody:
Oh . . . That would be Freeport, in that case. Most cities have
stone walls, really. Yes, they'll kill you there, too, but you'll be
OK if you kill enough Deathfist Orcs (something like a few hundred).
There are some guards walking around in West Commonlands that should
be on ths same faction as the FP guards. Commonlands faction may or
may not have much to with Freeport faction, depending on the NPC. go
to http://everquest.allakhazam.com and look for the link to "Faction
Information," or something like that.

--- In theeverquesttavern@y..., "the_dark_elf_drizzt_do_urden"
<joeyis007@y...> wrote:
> I don't know, its a zone over from West Commonlands. I'm not sure
of
> the name right now. If my faction with Commonlands is good, would
it
> carry to this city as well?
>
> Thanks once again btw
